prompt: Photorealistic close-up of a pristine vintage Leica M3 rangefinder camera resting on a dark, polished wooden desk. Soft, warm directional light highlights the chrome details, leatherette texture, and lens glass. In the blurred background, a collector's display cabinet with other classic cameras is subtly visible. Composition follows the rule of thirds, placing the camera slightly off-center to the left, leaving space on the right. Shallow depth of field emphasizes the camera's craftsmanship and value. Style: Elegant, professional, high-detail macro photography. --ar 16:9 --style raw
name: old-camera-values-image-1.png

prompt: Overhead flat lay composition showcasing a diverse collection of vintage cameras spread across a light grey, textured surface. Include a mix: a boxy Kodak Brownie, a twin-lens reflex (TLR) like a Rolleiflex, an early SLR (e.g., Pentax K1000), and a folding bellows camera. Scattered amongst them are antique price guides, a magnifying glass, and handwritten notes suggesting research and valuation. Lighting is bright, even studio lighting, casting soft shadows. The wide 16:9 frame captures the full arrangement clearly. Style: Clean, informative, detailed, catalog-like. --ar 16:9
name: old-camera-values-image-2.png

prompt: Medium shot focusing on the hands of an appraiser carefully examining an old, brass-lensed wooden field camera. One hand holds a jeweler's loupe to the lens element, while the other gently supports the camera body. The background shows a cluttered but organized workshop with camera parts, tools, and reference books, softly out of focus. Natural light streams in from a window to the side, illuminating the textures of the wood, brass, and the appraiser's hands. Composition places the interaction slightly right of center in the wide frame. Style: Documentary, detailed, focused, slightly nostalgic. --ar 16:9
name: old-camera-values-image-3.png

prompt: Dramatic side-by-side comparison within a single 16:9 frame. On the left, a dusty, tarnished, and slightly damaged vintage folding camera sits under harsh, cool top lighting, emphasizing imperfections. On the right, an identical model camera, meticulously restored and gleaming, sits under soft, warm, flattering light. A subtle dividing line or difference in background texture separates the two halves. The composition balances both cameras equally within the wide format. Style: Comparative, high-contrast, photorealistic, informative. --ar 16:9
name: old-camera-values-image-4.png

prompt: Wide-angle interior shot of a charmingly cluttered antique camera store or a stall at a flea market. Wooden shelves line the walls, packed with dozens of different old cameras – SLRs, rangefinders, box cameras, movie cameras – creating visual depth. Warm, slightly diffused overhead lighting illuminates the scene, catching glints off lenses and chrome. A potential customer might be partially visible browsing in the mid-ground, adding scale. The 16:9 aspect ratio captures the breadth and atmosphere of the collection and environment. Style: Atmospheric, detailed, realistic, slightly nostalgic, environmental portrait. --ar 16:9
name: old-camera-values-image-5.png
